meanings.sent1: The chocolate coating on the donut was delicious.
meanings.sent2: The car had a shiny coating of wax after being polished.
meanings.sent3: The coating of snow on the ground made everything look magical.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a sweet coating that covered her sadness.
meanings.sent5: The protective coating on the phone prevented it from getting scratched.

meanings.definition: A material applied to a surface for protection or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The coating of paint on the walls brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The coating of varnish on the table made it shine.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret sauce coating on the chicken wings was irresistible.
meanings.sent4: The coating of dust on the old book gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The protective coating on the metal gate prevented it from rusting.
